_header: Saint John for grace thou crave
Subjects: prayers, to saints; John the apostle, saint
_description: Prayer to Saint John — one 6-line stanza (aabccb)

BLAdd39574.Transcription:
Seynt Iohn for grace þou craueÞat of his mercyhe he wole us
                    saueAs þou nexst hym were boren besteAnd whanne we schulen fro
                    hens weendeThou gete us grace to make good eendeIn heuene blis
                    wiþ hym to reste
